weekly-meets.name: JDM Weekly Meetup #1
weekly-meets.desc: Join us for the first weekly meetup of JDM enthusiasts. A chance to showcase your ride and meet fellow enthusiasts.

weekly-meets.name: JDM Weekly Meetup #2
weekly-meets.desc: Meet up with other car lovers and enjoy an evening of discussions and car showcases.

race-drift.name: Mumbai Drift Championship
race-drift.desc: Witness the best drifters battle it out in Mumbai. A thrilling race you can't miss!

race-drift.name: Hyderabad Drift Showdown
race-drift.desc: Experience intense drifting action at the iconic Hyderabad Drift Showdown.

race-drift.name: Bangalore Street Drift
race-drift.desc: Watch top drifters race through the streets of Bangalore at night.

race-drift.name: Chennai Drift Cup
race-drift.desc: Join the Chennai Drift Cup and witness fierce competition from local and international drivers.

seminar.name: JDM History Seminar
seminar.desc: Learn the rich history of JDM cars and their impact on the global automotive culture.

seminar.name: JDM Performance Tuning Workshop
seminar.desc: Discover the secrets behind tuning JDM cars for ultimate performance.

exhibitions.name: JDM Car Exhibition
exhibitions.desc: Explore rare and vintage JDM cars on display at this exclusive exhibition.

exhibitions.name: India Auto Show
exhibitions.desc: See the latest JDM models and concept cars at the India Auto Show.

auctions.name: Rare JDM Car Auction
auctions.desc: Bid on one-of-a-kind JDM cars at this exciting auction event.

auctions.name: Vintage JDM Car Auction
auctions.desc: A chance to own a piece of JDM history. Don't miss out on the rarest cars.

tours.name: JDM Road Tour
tours.desc: Join us for a scenic road tour with fellow JDM car enthusiasts, exploring the beauty of Goa.
